Blizzard announced Diablo IV and showed two trailers. The game will be extremely grim
01 Nov 2019, 18:33 by Daria Gromova
Blood and guts in the best traditions of the first part.
The long-awaited announcement of Diablo IV took place at Blizzcon. The game takes place several years after the events of Diablo III, when millions fell victims of the battle between Heaven and the Underworld. The antagonist, as reported in the leaks, became Lilith.
In honor of the announcement, Blizzard also showed a 9-minute cinematic trailer.



At the same time, the first gameplay trailer was posted on the official YouTube channel. He confirmed early leaks about the hero's available classes: barbarian, sorceress and druid.



The fourth part will be available for PS4, Xbox One and PC.
